DataElement.preferredName: Total Normal Tissue Weight Milligram Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity documenting the total weight of all normal tissue collected from a non-diseased patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm._A group or layer of cells that work together to perform a specific function._The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity._A metric unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a gram or 1000 micrograms.
